markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mockingbird's Disarm](/Feats.aspx?ID=4148) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 80</row>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=45)

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1873)

**Access**
Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.

**Trigger**
You succeed at a check to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) or use [Tumbling Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1877), and you moved through an enemy's space.

</column>

---

The Mockingbird is a master at running into foes and coming away with their weapons. Mimicking their skill, you strike at a foe's wrist while tumbling past them, weakening their grip. You attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the enemy whose space you moved through. You can use [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) instead of [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) for this check.
